author: Rachel Kaser
description:
Mark Zuckerberg, CEO of Facebook, today returned to his old Harvard dorm room 13 years after dropping out -- and he broadcast the whole tour on Facebook Live for several thousand viewers.

title: Mark Zuckerberg returns to his Harvard dorm on Facebook Live

author: Catherine Buni and Soraya Chemaly
description: Users post text, images, and more relentlessly on Facebook, where teams of thousands cannot scramble fast enough to scrub them off the site.
title: How do you fix Facebook moderation’s problem? Figure out what Facebook is

author: Andreas Weck
description: Mark Zuckerberg führt per Live-Video durch Zimmer H-33 im Kirkland House in Harvard. Dem Ort, an dem er Facebook erfand.
title: In diesem Harvard-Zimmer wurde Facebook erfunden

description: Share Lab uses flow charts and data analysis to map one of the greatest forces shaping our world - Facebook.

description: Facebook introduced personal fundraisers in beta back in March, taking on services like GoFundMe, butwith a a particular focus on critical needs like disaster relief and education. ...

author: Napier Lopez
description:
Facebook is introducing a couple of changes today that make it easier to spot trending topics and the coverage around them.

First up, there's a bit of a visual redesign. Previously, ...
title: Facebook redesigns Trending topics to make news easier to find

author: Charlie Nash
description: Facebook moderators have been ordered to remove "dehumanizing" posts about migrants and refugees, but not Holocaust denial posts.
title: Report: Facebook Moderators Told to Remove 'Dehumanizing' Posts About Refugees, But Not Holocaust Denial Posts - Breitbart

title: Facebook is trying to salvage Instant Articles by adding support for Google AMP
